name: BoxAndUnBox - Wowie Jam
description:
You are a post office worker that needs to sort a ton of boxes. Use the new laser blaster to send the good packages(Boxes) to their destination but incinerate the bad packages(UnBoxes). If you accidentally send an UnBox, it's okay you still have 2 more chances until you're fired, displayed by the bottom shovel icons. If you let a good box slip by then use the AI(spacebar) to fix your mistake but don't use them too much or they'll overheat and you'll have to wait for a cooldown.

Click the tan boxes avoid the red boxes

Use AI - spacebar

send Boxes - left click
